name: Michael McDaniel: Cheap, effective shelter for disaster relief
description: Michael McDaniel designed housing for disaster relief zones -- inexpensive, easy to transport, even beautiful â€“ but found that no one was willing to build it. Persistent and obsessed, he decided to go it alone. At TEDxAustin, McDaniel show us his Exo Reaction Housing Solution and shares how he's dedicating his free time to working with suppliers and manufacturers to prepare for the next natural disaster. (Filmed at TEDxAustin.)
